title: If치
summary: If치 is a Yoruba religion and system of divination. Its  literary corpus is the Odu If치. Orunmila is identified as the Grand Priest, as he is who revealed divinity and prophecy to the world. Babalawos or Iyanifas use either the divining chain known as Opele, or the sacred palm or kola nuts called Ikin, on the wooden divination tray called Opon If치.
